1.0.name: wordpress/google1-button
1.0.description:
This plugin add the Google + 1 Button into your web site or blog. Easily allows your blog post or page to be shared. It provides a live count of how many times your post/page has been shared throughout Google.

Features

  • Now includes support for the Google +1 button
  • Live count
  • Easily installation and customisation
  • Quicker loading times for the buttons
